long_description: welcome to the official page of krishna financial corporation. +91 9911505309 licjoshi05@gmail.comwe specialize in providing comprehensive planning services for child education, retirement, health insurance, and investment. our child education planning services help parents navigate the often-complex process of saving for and paying for their child's education. we work with families to understand their financial goals and develop a plan that fits their unique needs and circumstances. our retirement planning services are designed to help individuals and couples plan for a secure and comfortable retirement. we take a holistic approach to retirement planning, considering factors such as social security, pensions, investments, and other income streams. our health insurance planning services help individuals and families understand their options and make informed decisions about their health coverage. we can help you navigate the different types of health insurance available, including employer-sponsored plans, individual plans, and government-funded programs. our investment planning services are designed to help individuals and families grow their wealth over time. we take a personalized approach to investment planning, taking into account factors such as risk tolerance, investment time horizon, and overall financial goals. get in touch for your planning needs. we look forward to working with you to achieve your financial goals.
